entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
